function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of ventilation and airflow in residential spaces leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission within homes and among residents","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation systems and airflow design in residential spaces to improve air quality and reduce the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, natural ventilation design, air purifiers","People":"Residents, architects, planners, local governments","Owner":"Architects, planners, local governments"},{"Description":"Inadequate spatial design leading to overcrowding and close contact among residents","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact disease transmission due to crowded living spaces","Mitigation":"Implementing appropriate spatial planning to reduce overcrowding and maintain safe distancing within homes","Technologies":"Space-efficient furniture, modular design, smart spatial planning","People":"Residents, architects, planners","Owner":"Architects, planners"},{"Description":"Insufficient separation of different zones within homes leading to cross-contamination among different areas","Impact":"Higher risk of cross-contamination and disease spread within the home","Mitigation":"Implementing clear spatial delineation and separation between different zones within homes to prevent cross-contamination","Technologies":"Partition walls, zoning design, separate airflow systems","People":"Residents, architects, planners","Owner":"Architects, planners"}]}
